member.name: T:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration
member.summary: Configuration used for reading and writing CSV data.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.PropertyBindingFlags
member.summary: Gets or sets the property binding flags. This determines what properties on the custom class are used. Default is Public | Instance.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.HasHeaderRecord
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if the CSV file has a header record. Default is true.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.WillThrowOnMissingField
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if an exception will be thrown if a field defined in a mapping is missing. True to throw an exception, otherwise false. Default is true.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.DetectColumnCountChanges
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether changes in the column count should be detected. If true, a will be thrown if a different column count is detected.
member.value: true if [detect column count changes]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.IsHeaderCaseSensitive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether matching header column names is case sensitive. True for case sensitive matching, otherwise false. Default is true.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.IgnoreHeaderWhiteSpace
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether matcher header column names will ignore white space. True to ignore white space, otherwise false. Default is false.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.TrimHeaders
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether headers should be trimmed. True to trim headers, otherwise false. Default is false.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.TrimFields
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether fields should be trimmed. True to trim fields, otherwise false. Default is false.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.Delimiter
member.summary: Gets or sets the delimiter used to separate fields. Default is ',';

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.Quote
member.summary: Gets or sets the character used to quote fields. Default is '"'.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.Comment
member.summary: Gets or sets the character used to denote a line that is commented out. Default is '#'.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.AllowComments
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if comments are allowed. True to allow commented out lines, otherwise false.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.BufferSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the buffer used for reading and writing CSV files. Default is 2048.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.QuoteAllFields
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all fields are quoted when writing, or just ones that have to be. and cannot be true at the same time. Turning one on will turn the other off.
member.value: true if all fields should be quoted; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.QuoteNoFields
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether no fields are quoted when writing. and cannot be true at the same time. Turning one on will turn the other off.
member.value: true if [quote no fields]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.CountBytes
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the number of bytes should be counted while parsing. Default is false. This will slow down parsing because it needs to get the byte count of every char for the given encoding. The needs to be set correctly for this to be accurate.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.Encoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the encoding used when counting bytes.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.CultureInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the culture info used to read an write CSV files.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.SkipEmptyRecords
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether empty rows should be skipped when reading. A record is considered empty if all fields are empty.
member.value: true if [skip empty rows]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.IgnoreQuotes
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if quotes should be ingored when parsing and treated like any other character.

member.name: P:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfiguration.IgnorePrivateAccessor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if private get and set property accessors should be ignored when reading and writing. True to ignore, otherwise false. Default is false.

member.name: T:CsvHelper.Configuration.CsvConfigurationException
member.summary: Represents configuration errors that occur.

member.name: M:CsvHelper.CsvParser.GetChar(System.Char@,System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.String@,System.Boolean,System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the current character from the buffer while advancing the buffer if it ran out.
member.param: The char that gets the read char set to.
The start position of the current field.
The start position of the raw field.
The field.
A value indicating if the previous char read was a delimiter.
The position in the record we are currently at.
The length of the field in the buffer.
A value indicating if this call is a peek. If true and the end of the record was found no record handling will be done.
member.returns: A value indicating if read a char was read. True if a char was read, otherwise false.

member.name: M:CsvHelper.ICsvWriter.WriteField(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the field to the CSV file. The field may get quotes added to it. When all fields are written for a record, must be called to complete writing of the current record.
member.param: The field to write.

member.name: M:CsvHelper.ICsvWriter.WriteField(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Writes the field to the CSV file. This will ignore any need to quote and ignore the
and just quote based on the shouldQuote parameter. When all fields are written for a record, must be called to complete writing of the current record.
member.param: The field to write.
True to quote the field, otherwise false.

member.typeparam: The type of the parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.This type parameter is contravariant.
